original_text: Live with him for a time. Stay there until your brother is not angry with you any longer.
korean_text: 네 형의 노가 풀리기까지 몇 날 동안 그와 함께 거주하라

sentences.original_text: Live with him for a time
until your brother is not angry with you any longer
sentences.korean_translation: 네 형이 더 이상 너에게 화내지 않을 때까지
